data.name: XViewFreezable
desc: enables a SpreadsheetView to freeze columns and rows of the view.

methods.name: freezeAtPosition
desc: freezes panes with the specified number of columns and rows.
To freeze only horizontally, specify nRows as 0. To freeze only vertically, specify nColumns as 0.

methods.name: hasFrozenPanes
desc: returns TRUE if the view has frozen panes.
Only one of XViewSplitable.getIsWindowSplit() and XViewFreezable.hasFrozenPanes() can be TRUE.
